example:
() => (
  <Alert icon={<Icons.Visa />} title="Visa requirements check" type="warning">
    <Stack spacing="compact">
      <Text>
        The requirements found here are for reference purposes only. Contact the
        embassy or your foreign ministry for more information.
      </Text>
      <Heading type="title4">
        Make sure you know the visa requirements for:
      </Heading>
      <List>
        <ListItem icon={<CountryFlag code="pl" name="Poland" />}>
          Poland
        </ListItem>
      </List>
      <AlertButton type="warning">Check visa requirements</AlertButton>
    </Stack>
  </Alert>
)

info.title: Success alert
info.description: Success alerts confirm that an instruction from the user, such as to make a payment or request a refund, was processed successfully. Usually used without an action button.
